Package level.elements

Class Level

java.lang.Object
level.elements.Level
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa.Graph<Tile>, com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa.indexed.IndexedGraph<Tile>
public class Level extends Object implements com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa.indexed.IndexedGraph<Tile>
A level is a set of connect rooms to play in.

  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(List<Node> nodes, List<Room> rooms)
      Create a new level
      Parameters:
      nodes - A list of nodes that represent the structure of the level. Each noe is represented by a room.
      rooms - A list of rooms that are in this level. Each represents a node.
